questions.question:
A metal surface with dimension (L x W) 4.6 m x 2.9 m at a temperature 278o C has surrounding temperature 38o C. Convective heat transfer coefficient (h) is 20 w/m2-k & emissivity of surface is (ε) 0.8. Take value of Boltzmann Constant as 5.67 x 10-8 w/m2-k4
T1 = (278 + 273) K
T2 = (38 + 273) K. Calculate heat loss by the convection
Qc = h A(T1 - T2)

A metal surface with dimension (L x W) 4.6 m x 2.9 m at a temperature 278o C has surrounding temperature 38o C. Convective heat transfer coefficient (h) is 20 w/m2-k & emissivity of surface is (ε) 0.8. Take value of Boltzmann Constant as 5.67 x 10-8 w/m2-k4
T1 = (278 + 273) K
T2 = (38 + 273) K. Calculate heat loss by the radiation
Qr = σ A ε(T14 - T24)
